sentence.Network_en: Actions : Antipyretic, antidotal, antiphlogistic and analgesic.
sentence.Network_cn: 功能: 清热解毒, 消肿止痛.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To observe the clinical effect of antipyretic and antidotal on herpes zoster disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 观察和验证清热解毒类中药对带状疱疹的临床功效.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To inquire into antidotal effects of sulfhydryl compounds on acute poisoning with tetramine in mice.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 探讨巯基化合物对毒鼠强急性中毒小鼠的解毒作用.

this project adjoins the first of Meier's three towers and is simultaneously an antidotal design and a formal and tectonic play off of his buildings .这个工程与梅尔三塔中的一个塔相邻，同时也是一个矫正性的设计，是对梅尔建筑构造的完善。
